titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7681

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 29 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State --
I have commissioned & delivered the following viz:

p.hi: John G. Eve Captain -- date August 29. 1862 --

body.p:
James A. Johnson Captain
Preston F. Hansbrough 1 Lieut:
George Burgess 2 Lieut: } dated Aug 25. 1862.

James B. Harrison Captain
Edgar M. Guynn 1 Lieut:
David J. Block 2 Lieut } dated Aug 22, 1862.

George W. McCullough Capt:
Wm H. Poindexter 1st Lieut:
Thomas Hardey 2d. Lieut:
James T. Donaldson Jr 2 Lieut: Super } dated Aug 26. 1862

James H. Hudspeth Captain
Wm A. Sasseen 1st Lieut: } dated Aug 26, 1862

Wm D. Crane 2d Lieut:
Richd. L. Boulware 2 Lieut. super:
Saml. F. Johnson Captain
Presley L. Morehead. 1 Lieut
Thomas Boyd 2 Lieut:
Clark E. Ritter 2 Lieut: super
James M. Morrow Captain
Samuel M. Crandle 1 Lieut:
Fielding W. Starling 2 Lieut:
Sam B Read 2 Lieut: super: } All dated Aug 26th. 1862,

Wm K. Sadler Asst. Surg:
Reid Leslie McMurtry 1 Lieut } both dated Aug. 21. 1862.

Joseph Pickering 1 Lieut: dated Aug 29. 1862.
Tho. Yountsey 2 Lieut: dated Aug 29. 1862,

Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ken Vols:
